Understate: The claim may understate the possibility that the interaction was misinterpreted by the young man.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to conclusively prove that the gas station owners are anti-military.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the refusal to sell tobacco to the serviceman was solely because the owners are anti-military, without considering other possible reasons.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the refusal was due to the serviceman's age being below the legal requirement to purchase tobacco.
